name: fred_browse
description: Browse FRED's catalog through categories, releases, or sources to discover available economic data series

arguments.name: category_id
arguments.desc: ID of a specific category to browse

arguments.name: release_id
arguments.desc: ID of a specific release to browse

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Maximum number of results to return

arguments.name: offset
arguments.desc: Number of results to skip for pagination

name: fred_search
description: Search for economic data series by keywords, tags, or filters across the entire FRED database

arguments.name: search_text
arguments.desc: Keywords to search for in series titles and descriptions

arguments.name: limit
arguments.desc: Maximum number of results to return

name: fred_get_series
description: Retrieve data for specific FRED series with transformation and date range support

arguments.name: series_id
arguments.desc: The FRED series ID to retrieve data for
